function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Controversial debate on the origin of covid-19 natural mutant vs bio-engineered","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic or endemic created by human activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exploitation of national crises to push through unpopular and extreme measures on the environment and labour rights","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extremities in pollution and unhygienic levels resulting from human activities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission through close contact and body fluids","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through contaminated objects","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on healthcare system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inter-individual physical interaction","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of emergency services during strict lockdown","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forbidding contact between people from different households","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High morbidity rate for elderly and patients with co-morbidities due to compromised natural immunity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific medicine or vaccine to control covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social lockdown as the only preventive measure for covid-19 control.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient prevention measures for viral transmission","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in building and construction projects","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient deconstruction and demolition processes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper material recovery and reuse practices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within commercial buildings due to changes in job dynamics and procedures.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding long-lasting consequences of the covid-19 pandemic on building specifications and design.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of government support for the construction sector during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases at building sites","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the post-covid-19 industry condition","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants impacted by an epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High percentage of participants directly involved in projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity measures for epidemic impacts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survey data collected from multiple continents and countries, potentially increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases during data collection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in respondent locations and government directives, including legislation and it facilities for remote work, may contribute to differing levels of exposure and risk for contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close-ended and open-ended survey questions may lead to qualitative and quantitative data collection, potentially capturing complex and diverse perspectives on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific description of ’possible sample’ leading to sampling bias","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adoption of easy random sampling without consideration of population characteristics","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the central limit theorem for sample sizes greater than 30","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of literature on the effects of covid-19 on construction firms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited sample size in the research","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of spss 25.0 for data analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emerging technology built by the transition of functions from biological systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Biomimetic transformation into a technical circumstance of the natural life cycle","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bio-mimicked products and methods need analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of hazardous materials in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contraction of the German economy due to covid-19 impacts on the building industry and construction operations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions and slowdown of supplies and labor availability in the building industry due to covid-19.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fluctuation of building operations in states and cities based on essential sector classification and covid-19 impacts.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelm of information leading to entropy of the system","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in credibility of personal opinions over scientific data","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overconfidence and misinformation among physicians","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public trust in medical professionals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation regarding the use of anti-inflammatory drugs in relation to covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
